channel.title: How to get commands and put them in server
channel.description:
Ehhem. How do i get a food command, barrows, and starter kit commands?
If it's a tut will you post it here?
If you have the url post it here too.
Thank you, Lele

item.title: How to get commands and put them in server
item.dc:creator: @iceman21 iceman21
item.description:
@iceman21 wrote:

this is so simple il post a noobkit thing one sec

else if (command.startsWith("noobkit")) { addItem(1377,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(2904,1); addItem(7461,1); sendMessage("HAHAHAHA Stupid Noob"); }

ok ill explain this is simple tho. up where it says command starts with (noobkit) in that () is the command name so in the game u would type ::noobkit. the next thing is the items so you would write
addItem(item#,howmany); then sendMessage means when they enter the command, in the textbox would say you stupid noob and then the } closes it. and the { at the top opens it

[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 01:14:26 PM[/size][hr]also if you want you can make the command so that only like mods or even just one single player use the command

so for the mods only you would use this:

else if (command.startsWith("noobkit") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(1377,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(2904,1); addItem(7461,1); sendMessage("HAHAHAHA Stupid Noob"); }

to make it so only one player can use the command use this:

else if (command.startsWith("noobkit") && playerName.equals("iceman21")) { addItem(1377,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(2904,1); addItem(7461,1); sendMessage("HAHAHAHA Stupid Noob"); } its something like that for the second one

Read full topic
